thag2.30:1.1: I regularly sat close by true persons
thag2.30:1.4: the direct route that culminates in the deathless.
thag2.30:2.1: I’ve slain the desire to be reborn,
thag2.30:2.2: it won’t be found in me again.
thag2.30:2.3: It was not, and it won’t be in me,
thag2.30:2.4: and it isn’t found in me now.
